_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Merry Christmas! Santa will be on the slopes today, arcing turns and passing out candy. Catch him from 9:00 - 11:00 a.m. A new storm system has arrived, bringing mixed precip to the mountain today and pure snow starting tomorrow. 1 to 2 feet of fluff is forecast through Saturday. Conditions on the hill are very variable right now. Warm temps and wet weather have softened terrain, although youll still find icy patches here and there. Please check your speed and keep a safe distance from other skiers and riders. Due to early season conditions, there is no beginner terrain accessible from Moonbeam. Fleet Street is the only route down from Apex Express and should be considered experts only. Village guests looking for a mellow start should catch the free shuttle to the Moonbeam base area. Have a great holiday on the hill!

_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Know The Code, limit your speed, and stay in control while skiing and riding.
